title: Pre-Service Teacher Training Program for Enhancing Elderly e-Learning Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Knowledge and Language Education Experience
context.additional_context: Prospective teachers learn practical methods for designing e-learning content, considering elderly learners' cognitive traits and technology proficiency

learning_goals: When designing e-learning modules for older adults, visual elements and step-by-step instructions can be effectively integrated.
Language learning simulation materials can be developed for application in smartphone-based limited-technology environments.
The process of improving senior-friendly e-learning content by reflecting formative assessment results can be explained.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
